## FileContainer.setDisk() method

Establish the disk repository from an array of globs.

Signature:

```typescript
setDisk(glob: string[]): this;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type       | Description |
| --------- | ---------- | ----------- |
| glob      | string\[\] |             |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
fsInstance.setDisk(["*.js", "!*.css.js"]);
```
